amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $475 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike funding from the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 283 (Roll no. 508).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 283 (Roll no. 508).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
